title: Neck of lamb stuffed with cannellini beans and hazelnuts
description: This stuffed fillet of lamb is simple to make, can be prepared in advance and makes a spectacular centrepiece.
ingredients: 4 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, plus extra for greasing
2 sprigs fresh rosemary, leaves only, chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1.2kg/2lb 10¼oz lamb neck fillets, each butterflied, then beaten out to 15cm x 30cm x 2cm/6in x 12in x 1in rectangles using a meat mallet
